name: Transfert
description:
Save the colony.

Controls

  • LEFT and RIGHT for movement
  • ENTER for respawn

Notes:

  • The larva is the hitbox!
  • It is possible to win
  • If the game has no graphics, refresh the web page

This game was made for Ludum Dare 44. Please vote here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/44/transfert
